outputs.output_descr:
The Strategy and Policy Unit (SPU) is the technical arm in the Presidency set up as part of the Government's efforts at rationalizing functions and institutions in the Civil Service., It will champion the implementation of the Government's Agenda for Change as agreed upon at the first Government Retreat held at Bumbuna.
Key objectives include
1. Accountability increased through introduction of the results based management system and other accountability initiatives. 2. Overall quality of government policy enhanced through better coordination between MDAs, donors and other relevant institutions. 3. Strategy and Policy Committee (SPC) fully operational with office, necessary staff and equipment as well as detailed work plan.

project_title: SUPPORT TO OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
